seo.title: Darmowe i tanie atrakcje w Positano
seo.description: Lista aktywności bezpłatnych lub za niewielką opłatą: spacery, punkty widokowe i wydarzenia.

linkLabel: Darmowe i tanie atrakcje w Positano

sections.title: Tłumaczenie w przygotowaniu.
body: Start at the terrace outside Chiesa Nuova for sunrise colours washing over the bay; bring a 500 ml (17 oz) bottle because there are no taps nearby.
Walk Via Cristoforo Colombo and the Viale Pasitea balconies around golden hour for postcard angles without booking a table.

sections.title: DIY walking routes
body: Explore the narrow lanes in the Liparlati district, ducking into tiny courtyards and ceramic-lined staircases between Via dei Mulini and Via Pasitea.

faqs.q: Are there free showers on the beaches?

a: The trail itself is free year-round. Budget for the €2.40 SITA bus ride up to Nocelle and back if you do not want to hike both ways.
